description: A collection of circles in an arrow-shaped formation with the triangular portion in the top left corner of the formation; there is also a rectangular formation of circles in the bottom right corner of the formation attached to the thin line of circles between the two corners. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a light blue triangle in the top left corner of the formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
